title: Identification Cards | ID Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           ID Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  ID Center      ID Center   Main Menu    Identification Cards           Get an i-card    Lost Card or Stolen Card    Fees    UINs    Visitor Cards    Name Badges         Dragon Dollar$ and Flames Fare           Using Dragon Dollar$ and Flames Fare    Purchase Locations & Fees    Terms & Conditions    Meal Plans    Add Dragon Dollar$ and Flames Fare Online         CTA U-PASS           U-PASS Alternate Pickup    Troubleshoot U-Pass    About U-PASS    Eligibility    History    U-PASS @ CTA Website    U-Pass FAQ’s         FAQ           Identification Cards FAQ    Dragon Dollar$ & Meal Plans FAQ’s    U-Pass FAQ’s          Eyebrow menu    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Identification Cards      View Menu              Your i-card is your official permanent ID card and will be used as long as you attend or are employed by the University of Illinois at Chicago. It will give you access to appropriate services and facilities on campus. The i-card is your key to many of the following services on campus:   Dragon Dollar$ & Flames Fare  Libraries  Campus Recreation Centers  Parking  Computer Lab Printing  Banking with your i-card  Building Access  Photocopying  And much more   Not all services available to all cardholders. Some services may require a separate fee. Check with a departmental service provider for details.  The Main ID Center in SSB also provides the following services:   Passport Photos (2x2)  Immigration Photos (1.5x1.5)  General Use Color Photos (1x1)  International Student (ISIC) Card           Identification Cards           Get an i-card    Lost Card or Stolen Card    Fees    UINs    Visitor Cards    Name Badges
